name: Battlemesh 3D (Beta Pre-Release InDev Stage)
description:

Still in the development stage. Beta Version 0.2.0

If you are prepared to downrate this project, just imagine being the developer that made the game in his teenage years, so don't underestimate the imagination of an ambitious 13 year old Game Developer.
